text: So if I wanna ask stuff about poly (coz I just ended my O's and wanting to go poly) I should go for poly bot?

Yep! Just head over to@PolyChatBotand select that you‚Äôre an incoming/prospective student under ‚ÄúMy Profile‚Äù (and under ‚ÄúMatch Settings‚Äù  you can choose which poly/course/year your match should be from! :)
Ah I see okay... How about the verification part? Remain unverified?
Yep  incoming/prospect students will remain unverified for now (until they actually enroll and get a student email)!
Ah I see okay noted! Thank you!
@nusmatchbot@smumatchbot@ntumatchbotare the new uni bots for more specific matches where you can match by major/year etc. (for prospective students too).
you can also head to the@nuschatbot/@ntuchatbot/@smuchatbot/@susschatbot/@SUTDxSITbotfor more instant matches (but less specific)

P.S. for those who aren‚Äôt sure how the JC/Poly/Sec Sch bots work  the bot acts as a ‚Äúmiddleman‚Äù for both you and your match to exchanges messages.Haha there were a couple of tiktoks made by some users for the uni chat bots so you can check out to get a rough idea! The new bots I just released allow you set your match preferences though! :)https://vt.tiktok.com/ZSeCWLBPf/https://vt.tiktok.com/ZSeCWNVWe/https://vt.tiktok.com/ZSeCWNf12/

hi guys  I need your advice! i am currently planning to put a course from NYP on my first choice for JAE. The Cut off point is 15.My ELR2B2 is 18 & cca pts is 2.Do you think it‚Äôs possible for me to get into the course if I put it in my first choice? Is the selection process very stringent on my points or do they allow any leeway?Thank you!! :)
If 16 points net might have chance
It also depends on the course planned intake/popularity etc
My friend last time wanted go for pharms then abt the same situation as her ^
Yea that's why there's 12 choices in case you don't get in
Never know when the management will change the intake
My friend went social georontology course
Net pts mean without cca deduction?
Didnt meet the cutoff by 1 point
Im not sure if dae is possible
Advise you to just put it as 1st choice but ensure that you're willing to take your 2nd/3rd choices if offered

No one knows for sure whether the COP will change bc that's supply and demand but no harm trying but just prep contingencies
